keyValuePair.Value: %1s Yes To %2s's %3s Bid
%1s accepted %2s bid for %3s

It hasn't taken long for the deal to get done, although talks were reported to have been 'intense'. It seems there are still a few minor details to be ironed out, but the headline news is that %1s have accepted %2s's %3s bid for %4s. We'll have more on this transfer story over the next 24 hours.
After a few intense discussions, %1s has finally accepted %2s's bid of %3s for %4s. Stay tuned for more news regarding the transfer.
Will %1s be a big miss for the team today?
Will your decision over %1s affect today's game?
%1s is a player of great potential and I think big things were expected of him here. Now he's gone. What kind of impact do you expect his departure to have on the game?
Do you think the departure of %1s will have an impact on today's result?
I'm sure the lads are ready for the game.
I'm sure the lads are ready for the game.

Look, %1s is a good player. I like the boy. He did well for us and I wish him the best. But look at the quality in our squad. Look at the team I can put out today. We'll be ready for the game without %1s, that's for sure.

Look, %1s is a good player. I like the boy. He did well for us and I wish him the best. But look at the quality in our squad. Look at the team I can put out today. We'll be ready for the game without %1s, that's for sure.
Should it affect us?
To be honest, I'm not even thinking about %1s right now. He's got a decision to make about %2s's offer. All I'm thinking about is today's game and how we're going to win it with the players I've got.
Things move on quickly in football. And players move on. We'll get over it. We're all professional people here and we've got a job to do: winning today's game.

I'm surprised you even ask me a question like that, to be honest. You should know we're professional about what we do at this club. So, of course, we're ready for the game. Players come and go. That's football. We just make sure we keep our standards the same, whoever's on the team-sheet.

I'm surprised you even ask me a question like that, to be honest. You should know we're professional about what we do at this club. So, of course, we're ready for the game. Players come and go. That's football. We just make sure we keep our standards the same, whoever's on the team-sheet.
%1s %2s Debut Imminent?
We may see %1s wear %2s shirt soon enough.

It's been confirmed overnight that %1s have finally agreed to accept %2s's %4s offer for %3s. There are still a few contractual details to be ironed out, apparently, but sources claim we can expect to see %5s in a %2s shirt 'within days rather than weeks'.
%1s has finally accepted %2s's offer on %3s for %4s. If everything goes nicely, we will be seeing %5s wearing the %2s shirt soon enough.
What's your take on %1s's transfer? Did he want to move on or did you want to change things around?
What's your take on %1s's transfer? Did he want to move on or did you want to change things around?

Over the past couple of years, %1s have become one of the game's most important clubs. Do you think their higher profile is what has swung %2s in favour of agreeing to join them? Was he looking to move to a bigger club? Or was it more a case of him getting stale here and you wanting to change things around? These are the questions the fans are asking. What's your take on the transfer?

Over the past couple of years, %1s have become one of the game's most important clubs. Do you think their higher profile is what has swung %2s in favour of agreeing to join them? Was he looking to move to a bigger club? Or was it more a case of him getting stale here and you wanting to change things around? These are the questions the fans are asking. What's your take on the transfer?
Rumours don't interest me.
Rumours don't interest me.

All that is rumour and speculation. I'm not really interested in discussing any of that. All I'm interested in is the players I'll be choosing for today's game and the plan we've got to make sure we get the right result. Rumours sell newspapers but they don't win me football matches.

All that is rumour and speculation. I'm not really interested in discussing any of that. All I'm interested in is the players I'll be choosing for today's game and the plan we've got to make sure we get the right result. Rumours sell newspapers but they don't win me football matches.
All of that is news to me.
All of that is news to me.

I'm not usually interested in rumours but I can tell you that everything you've just said is a million miles off. I'm just focused on today's game. If and when the lad decides to move on, then we'll wish him all the best and just get on with the job we're doing here.

I'm not usually interested in rumours but I can tell you that everything you've just said is a million miles off. I'm just focused on today's game. If and when the lad decides to move on, then we'll wish him all the best and just get on with the job we're doing here.
Rumours and speculation! And way off the mark, too, by the way.

You're asking me to comment on rumour and speculation. I know what's been going on with %1s and this move to %2s. People have just been saying the first thing that comes into their heads. Let's not put extra pressure on the kid. We'll be fine whatever he decides to do.
These false rumors are getting out of hand. The decision for %1s to transfer to %2s was well thought and for his own best. I can't see how this change will affect our matches in any sort of way.
Does %1s leaving the club weaken your team?
Does %1s leaving the club weaken your team?

Now that everything's settled and %1s's transfer has gone through, how do you see your situation? Does him leaving weaken the team? Will you miss his quality? Are you still confident you can get results with the group of players you have left?

Now that everything's settled and %1s's transfer has gone through, how do you see your situation? Does him leaving weaken the team? Will you miss his quality? Are you still confident you can get results with the group of players you have left?
There's always been more to us than %1s.
Our squad has enough quality without %1s.
Look at our squad. Look at the team I can pick. This isn't a team that needed %1s to carry it. We've got more than enough quality and character here to handle the future without him.
Look at our squad. Look at the team I can pick. This isn't a team that needed %1s to carry it. We've got more than enough quality and character here to handle the future without him.
I'm not sure it's such a big deal for us.
I'm not sure it's such a big deal for us.

Players come and go all the time in football. You always know these things are going to happen. And that's why you plan for them. I don't see why we should suffer particularly, losing one player. Everyone in the dressing room is determined to do their best for the club.

Players come and go all the time in football. You always know these things are going to happen. And that's why you plan for them. I don't see why we should suffer particularly, losing one player. Everyone in the dressing room is determined to do their best for the club.
We'll stick together and we'll be fine.
Of course it will not!
This team has never been about one individual. We go into every game expecting to win it, whoever we have on the team-sheet. One player leaving isn't going to change our philosophy.
Our team always plays to win, regardless of who is wearing the shirt. That will not change with his departure.
%1s Set For %2s Debut
%1s will soon be wearing %2s shirt

Players and fans at %1s are now going to have to get used to life without %2s, who's set to join %3s. "I just need a new challenge," said the player earlier today. "I've enjoyed my time at %1s but I think I'm joining a team that can improve and I want to be part of that." We'll soon find out how %1s cope with losing such an influential figure, both on the pitch and in the dressing room.
Unfortunate news for %1s squad and fans as %2s is set to leave for %3s. We are yet to see how this will affect %1s in the upcoming matches.
Upgrade For %1s!
'A change for the better', says %1s.

After enduring days of speculation, fans and players at %1s are now going to have to get used to life after %2s. The player, it's been confirmed, is all set to join %3s. Maybe the transfer shouldn't come as a major surprise. %4s himself said earlier: "I'm grateful to the Boss and everybody at %1s for the chance they gave me here. But I think it's the right time in my career to challenge myself at a bigger club. I can't wait to get started!"

After enduring days of speculation, fans and players at %1s are now going to have to get used to life after %2s. The player, it's been confirmed, is all set to join %3s. Maybe the transfer shouldn't come as a major surprise. %4s himself said earlier: "I'm grateful to the Boss and everybody at %1s for the chance they gave me here. But I think it's the right time in my career to challenge myself at a bigger club. I can't wait to get started!"
Transfer Offer For %1s From %2s?
%1s reveals transfer offer from %2s

Transfer gossip is swirling around %1s. Reports suggest he's been talking to the assistant manager at %2s about the possibility of a move. It would be a big loss for the club where he came up through the ranks. %1s has become a first team regular and would now be difficult to replace. Will he stay loyal to his boyhood club or take the next step in his career at %2s? Nothing official yet from the player himself but we'll bring you news on this developing story as we get it.

Transfer gossip is swirling around %1s. Reports suggest he's been talking to the assistant manager at %2s about the possibility of a move. It would be a big loss for the club where he came up through the ranks. %1s has become a first team regular and would now be difficult to replace. Will he stay loyal to his boyhood club or take the next step in his career at %2s? Nothing official yet from the player himself but we'll bring you news on this developing story as we get it.
You've turned down %1s's offer. Is that right?
You've turned down %1s's offer. Is that right?

We understand that you've turned down an offer for %1s from %2s. Are you hoping to keep hold of the player? After all, he's come through your youth system. Or was the bid just too low? How much would it cost %2s to prise %1s away?

We understand that you've turned down an offer for %1s from %2s. Are you hoping to keep hold of the player? After all, he's come through your youth system. Or was the bid just too low? How much would it cost %2s to prise %1s away?
We rate %1s more highly than that.
%1s is far more valuable.

All I'll say is that %1s is a player we've developed here and we've been delighted with how well he's done since he started playing first team games. We can't stand in his way if he really wants to join %2s, but that will only happen if we receive the right offer for him. And we haven't so far. From %2s or from anyone else.

All I'll say is that %1s is a player we've developed here and we've been delighted with how well he's done since he started playing first team games. We can't stand in his way if he really wants to join %2s, but that will only happen if we receive the right offer for him. And we haven't so far. From %2s or from anyone else.
This isn't just about money, you know.
It wasn't all about the money.

I can tell you we haven't received a realistic offer for the lad from anybody. From my point of view, this isn't just about money anyway. He's a player who's come up through our youth system and he's an important player for us now.

I can tell you we haven't received a realistic offer for the lad from anybody. From my point of view, this isn't just about money anyway. He's a player who's come up through our youth system and he's an important player for us now.
%1s's offer? We're miles apart, I'd say.
%1s's offer? We're miles apart, I'd say.

Look, I don't think %1s's offer is anywhere near realistic. Since he broke into our first team, %2s's performances have been outstanding. He's a player with a massive future and it'll take big money for us to even think about letting him go.

Look, I don't think %1s's offer is anywhere near realistic. Since he broke into our first team, %2s's performances have been outstanding. He's a player with a massive future and it'll take big money for us to even think about letting him go.
%1s Snub %2s Bid For %3s.
%1s rejected %2s's bid for %3s

%1s have rejected a bid from %2s for %3s. They have made it clear that they don't want to lose a young player with great potential who has come up through the ranks at the club. One source has been quoted as saying: "It's going to take a very serious offer to get %3s out of %1s."
%1s has rejected the transfer offer from %2s for %3s and informed the club it will need a significantly higher offer to succeed in luring the player away from his boyhood club.
%1s Says No To %2s
%1s turned down offer from %2s to almost double his wages

According to reports earlier today, %1s has turned down a move to %2s. That's very good news for %3s, the club where the player has come up through the ranks to establish himself as a senior player. %4s himself has said: "This is the club that gave me a chance in football. I don't want to leave them now."
According to our reporters %1s has turned down the offer from %2s, strengthening his loyalty for his boyhood club. 'I have no intentions to leave %3s for the moment.', says %4s.
Any thoughts on %1s turning down %2s's offer?
Any thoughts on %1s turning down %2s's offer?

We understand %1s has rejected an offer to join %2s. What's behind the young player's decision, do you think? Does he really feel part of something here, perhaps, or have a sense of loyalty to the club? Or is it just he's already happy with the money he's on?

We understand %1s has rejected an offer to join %2s. What's behind the young player's decision, do you think? Does he really feel part of something here, perhaps, or have a sense of loyalty to the club? Or is it just he's already happy with the money he's on?
%1s knows what it means to play for this club.
%1s has always been a great team player.

We've all watched %1s's development here. He's matured so much. He does a great job for us on the pitch but he's become a real presence in the dressing room, too. He understands this club and he's earned the respect of his team-mates and the supporters. He's one of us.

We've all watched %1s's development here. He's matured so much. He does a great job for us on the pitch but he's become a real presence in the dressing room, too. He understands this club and he's earned the respect of his team-mates and the supporters. He's one of us.
I can't speak for him. It's his decision.
I can't speak for him. It's his decision.

It's not really for me to comment on why %1s has made his decision. What I can tell you is that we're all very pleased he's staying. He's been at the club a long time now. In fact, he's grown up here. As a manager, you never want to lose your best players. %1s is an important part of our plans.

It's not really for me to comment on why %1s has made his decision. What I can tell you is that we're all very pleased he's staying. He's been at the club a long time now. In fact, he's grown up here. As a manager, you never want to lose your best players. %1s is an important part of our plans.
I'm not surprised, to be honest.
I'm not surprised, to be honest.

I wasn't worried but I'm glad %1s has come out and committed his future to us. He's come up through the ranks here and I think he feels a real bond with the club. We have a special spirit in our dressing room and I'd have been surprised if %1s had decided to turn his back on that. We're delighted he's staying.

I wasn't worried but I'm glad %1s has come out and committed his future to us. He's come up through the ranks here and I think he feels a real bond with the club. We have a special spirit in our dressing room and I'd have been surprised if %1s had decided to turn his back on that. We're delighted he's staying.
%1s Reveal %2s Bid
%1s reveals transfer offer from %2s

Sources close to his current club have confirmed that %2s are interested in signing %1s. The player is reported to have met the %4s assistant manager to talk about the possibility of a move. It would be a big loss for the club where he has come up through the ranks and become a first team regular. Will %1s stay loyal or take the next step in his career at %2s? Nothing official yet on his decision but we'll bring you news on this developing story as soon as we get it.

%1s Accept %2s %3s Offer

It's been a long road for %4s, a local boy who rose through the ranks at %1s to become a first team star. But now he's moving on. After several days of intense discussions between the clubs, %1s have accepted a %3s bid from %2s. It'll surely be a wrench for a young player born and bred in %5s to leave the club that gave him his chance in senior football.
After a few intense discussions, %1s has finally accepted %2s's bid of %3s for %4s. Stay tuned for more news regarding the transfer.
%1s Set For %2s
We may see %1s wear %2s shirt soon enough.

He's the local boy who became a local hero at %1s, but the club have accepted a %4s bid from %2s for %3s. Supporters will be sorry to lose a player they sing about as 'one of our own'. But money talks, it seems. And all that's left now is for %5s to agree personal terms.
%1s has finally accepted %2s's offer on %3s for %4s. If everything goes nicely, we will be seeing %5s wearing the %2s shirt soon enough.

%1s turned down offer from %2s to almost double his wages

%1s Off To %2s
%1s will soon be wearing %2s shirt

%2s may be the local boy who grew up supporting the club, but %1s are set to lose him to %3s, who've had a bid for the player accepted and are reported to have agreed personal terms already. For supporters, it's a blow to be losing a player they saw as 'one of their own'. For %2s's former team-mates, it'll be a challenge. %1s will need to make a fresh start without him in the coming weeks, that's for sure.
Unfortunate news for %1s squad and fans as %2s is set to leave for %3s. We are yet to see how this will affect %1s in the upcoming matches.
Local Boy %1s On His Way
'A change for the better', says %1s.

It's always tough for supporters to see a local boy leave but it seems certain now that %2s has played his last game for %1s after he agreed a move to %3s. %4s himself said earlier: "Everybody knows how much %1s mean to me. I grew up around the corner from the ground and supported the club as a boy. I'm grateful to have had the chance to play for them but %3s are a massive club. This was an opportunity I couldn't say no to."

Rumors turned out to be true and unfortunately for %1s, we will soon be seeing %2s wearing %3s shirt on the pitch. 'I'm really grateful for everything that had been offered to me here, but I want to be part of a bigger club.', says %4s.
%1s Moves Upmarket
'A change for the better', says %1s.

It seems the rumours were all true. Having come up through the ranks at %1s, %2s is now set for a move to %3s once the transfer window opens for business. The news was confirmed by %4s himself earlier: "I'll always be grateful that I learned my trade here. But this was a chance to move on to a higher level and I feel I need to take on that challenge right now in my career."

Rumors turned out to be true and unfortunately for %1s, we will soon be seeing %2s wearing %3s shirt on the pitch. 'I'm really grateful for everything that had been offered to me here, but I want to be part of a bigger club.', says %4s.

'A change for the better', says %1s.

He may have been %5s born and bred, but %2s is all set for a move to %3s once the transfer window opens. Supporters will be sorry to see the last of their local hero but %4s has explained why it was time to leave %1s: "It's been great playing for the team I grew up supporting but %3s are a massive club. This is an amazing opportunity for me, one I couldn't turn down."

Rumors turned out to be true and unfortunately for %1s, we will soon be seeing %2s wearing %3s shirt on the pitch. 'I'm really grateful for everything that had been offered to me here, but I want to be part of a bigger club.', says %4s.
%1s %2s Move
%1s will soon be wearing %2s shirt

He's grown up in %1s's youth teams and looked set for a long career at the club but, instead, %2s seems set to join %3s when the transfer window opens. Supporters will be sad to lose a homegrown player and %1s will be sorry to lose a promising talent. The challenge now for %4s will be to make sure the team can still be competitive without one of its rising stars.

He's grown up in %1s's youth teams and looked set for a long career at the club but, instead, %2s seems set to join %3s when the transfer window opens. Supporters will be sad to lose a homegrown player and %1s will be sorry to lose a promising talent. The challenge now for %4s will be to make sure the team can still be competitive without one of its rising stars.
Local Lad %1s Quits For %2s
%1s will soon be wearing %2s shirt

Many players dream of playing for the club they grew up supporting and %2s lived that dream. But the local boy made good is moving on and is set to leave %1s to join %3s once the transfer window opens. Supporters may have thought of him as 'one of their own' but there's no room for sentiment in football, it seems. Now, %1s fans will have to wait to see how the team fares without its home-grown star in their line-up.
Unfortunate news for %1s squad and fans as %2s is set to leave for %3s. We are yet to see how this will affect %1s in the upcoming matches.
